Description.Name: Low-G Pool
Description.Details: When you have a large space with nothing critical in it and need to keep your crew in tip top shape, the obvious choice is to make a pool and fill it with chlorinated water. The Low-G Pool adds +3 to Crew Morale.

AssignedCastDescription: Commander, our crews physical and mental conditioning is top priority. A low-g pool give the resistance needed to keep great muscle tone for our Mechwarriors.
